page.title: 14Transport
page.content: By road Preesall is 10 miles from Blackpool,6 miles from Poulton-le-Fylde,15 from Lancaster and 10 from Garstang.The roads are reasonable,the A588 passing to the south-east.However neither Preesall nor Pilling are on the way from some- where to anywhere so there is no passing traffic.There is a toll-bridge on the main road between Preesall and Blackpool,Shard Bridge,which seems to deter some people from coming into the area.The road to Garstang is built on the "moss"(peat) and therefore tends to be rather hard on cars' suspensions.The road to Lancaster,an ancient route, used to be flooded at high tide until 1982 which again restricted access.There is a passenger ferry across the Wyre Estuary from Fleetwood to Knott-End,Adult 40p,Child 20p.
